name: ts-envs
description: Verification and type coercion for process.env environment variables in node.js

scripts.example: DB_URL=SQL://foo PORT=4000 PERMISSIONS={} VERBOSE=0 ts-node etc/example.ts
scripts.example:invalid: DB_URL=SQL://foo PORT=80 CACHE_URL=redis://foo PERMISSIONS={} VERBOSE=0 ts-node etc/example.ts

author: Andrew Peterson
